de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.pipeline.splitters

Class SensorSplitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.pipeline.splitters.SensorSplitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkDataSink

    public class SensorSplitter
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkDataSink
    This filter splits data by sensor type to specified pipelines. Sensor data will not be copied, so sensor data can only be sent to a single data sink.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.EnumMap<SensorType,NetworkDataSink> mNetworkDataSinkMap
      This map is used to store which data sink gets data from which sensor

      SensorSplitter()

      void close()

      • SensorSplitter

        public SensorSplitter()

    • Method Detail

      • addDataSink

        public void addDataSink(SensorType sensor,
                        NetworkDataSink dataSink)
        Add a new data sink which will receive all data sent from the specified sensor
        Parameters:
        dataSink - the data sink to receive all the data from sensor
        sensor - the sensor that should have its data forwarded to dataSink

      • remove

        public void remove(SensorType sensorType)
        Remove the specified sensor type. Data received from this sensor type will no longer be forwarded.
        Parameters:
        sensorType - data received from this sensor type will no longer be forwarded.

      • remove

        public void remove(NetworkDataSink sink)
        Remove every instance of the specified data sink from this pipeline element.
        Parameters:
        sink - the sink that should no longer receive data from this SensorSplitter

      • onData

        public void onData(NetworkDevice origin,
                   SensorData data,
                   float userSensitivity)
        Forward the data to the respective data sink
        Specified by:
        onData in interface NetworkDataSink
        Parameters:
        origin - network device that sent the data
        data - received data
        userSensitivity - sensitivity set by the user

      • close

        public void close()
        Not needed for this splitter
        Specified by:
        close in interface NetworkDataSink
